About

Dr. Mackey graduated from University of Ca in 1995 and completed a residency at Children's Hospital Orange Co. Dr. Ernest Mackey, MD is a Pediatrician in Tustin, CA and has 30 years experience. Dr. Mackey currently practices at Pediatric and Adult Medicine and are affiliated with Children's Hospital of Orange County and Orange County Global Medical Center. Dr. Mackey has experience treating conditions like Fever among other conditions at varying frequencies. At present, Dr. Mackey received an average rating of 4.2/5 from patients and has been reviewed 5 times. Dr. Mackey's office accepts new patients and telehealth appointments. Dr. Mackey is board certified in Pediatrics and accepts multiple insurance plans.

About Ernest D. Mackey



My role as a pediatrician is to assist parents in raising their children, and to educate them about the best treatment options for health, illness and child safety. I enjoy my profession and absolutely love interacting with the children. It is a privilege to be a part of my patients’ lives and to watch them grow and develop into mature adults.

Dr. Mackey currently practices at Pediatric and Adult Medicine and are affiliated with Children's Hospital of Orange County and Orange County Global Medical Center. Dr. Mackey has experience treating conditions like Fever among other conditions at varying frequencies. At present, Dr. Mackey received an average rating of 4.2/5 from patients and has been reviewed 5 times. Dr. Mackey's office accepts new patients and telehealth appointments. Dr. Mackey is board certified in Pediatrics and accepts multiple insurance plans.

My son's been a patient of Dr Mackey's since birth. We were referred to him by a close physician friend. Dr. Mackey's excellent at diagnosing and providing outstanding care. As needed he's referred us to gifted CHOC specialists and followed up to coordinate care. My son is now 16, a healthy, young hockey player who trusts the patient physician relationship with Dr Mackey. As a parent, I want our son to be comfortable to come to us with medical or emotional questions, but if not us then his Dr.

About Ernest D. Mackey
My role as a pediatrician is to assist parents in raising their children, and to educate them about the best treatment options for health, illness and child safety. I enjoy my profession and absolutely love interacting with the children. It is a privilege to be a part of my patients’ lives and to watch them grow and develop into mature adults.

Pediatrician in Tustin, CA

Our practice is dedicated to improving the lives of the children we serve by providing quality care in a child-centered environment. To achieve this goal, we offer convenient office hours, helpful patient resources and an outstanding level of support and expertise. You will receive the same quality, educational and compassionate service with every appointment.
If you have any questions or want to schedule your child’s first visit to our office, feel free to call us today. Our friendly and highly knowledgeable staff is available to support and assist you with any questions or concerns about the health of your child.
